DOC.brief_summary: A major goal Department Veterans Affairs end Veteran homelessness 2015 . The VA 's large homelessness initiative joint Departments Housing Urban Development ( HUD ) Veterans Affairs ( VA ) Supportive Housing program ( HUD-VASH ) , expand greatly recent year via allocation 30,000 Housing First voucher 2008 2010 increase funding hire 1,000 new program case manager . However , recent expansion result number implementation challenge include delay distribution housing voucher dropout among program participant ( 25 % house HUD-VASH drop within year ) . Much dropout attributed untreated issue face many Veterans enrol HUD-VASH . The common among untreated issue mental health substance use disorder . The presence disorder due large part fact much HUD-VASH case management focus housing placement maintenance , limited attention mental health , substance abuse , related psychosocial issue , leave untreated , negatively impact voucher distribution housing stability . This project test implementation model-Getting To Outcomes ( GTO ) -designed assist delivery intervention Veterans co-occurring mental health substance use disorder ( MISSION-Vet ) HUD-VASH program . The propose study compare implementation MISSION-Vet currently plan VA Office Patient Care Services enhance approach use GTO model . Thus , project contribute end Veteran homelessness 2015 , pledge make President Obama .
DOC.detailed_description: This project test implementation platform-Getting To Outcomes ( GTO ) -designed assist delivery evidence-based intervention Veterans co-occurring mental health substance use disorder ( MISSION-Vet ) HUD-VASH program . This project cluster randomize control trial compare implementation MISSION-Vet augment GTO MISSION-Vet Implemented Usual ( IU ) three large HUD-VASH program country : VA Central Western Massachusetts Healthcare System ( Northampton , MA ) , VA Capitol Health Care Network ( Washington , D.C. ) , VA Eastern Colorado Health Care System ( Denver , CO ) . This project randomly assign 150 HUD-VASH case manager 1106 Veterans caseloads receive HUD-VASH voucher case management service two group 1-year rolling admission basis determine Veteran receives housing voucher . The control group receive MISSION-Vet addition HUD-VASH case management service intervention group receive control , however HUD-VASH case manager access GTO implementation support . To compare case manager implement MISSION-Vet augmented GTO HUD-VASH case manager use IU strategy follow variable : ( 1 ) fidelity MISSION-Vet intervention ; ( 2 ) proportion time Veteran house ; ( 3 ) mental health , substance use , functional outcome among Veterans ; ( 4 ) factor key successful deployment new treatment specify Reach , Effectiveness , Adoption , Implementation , & Maintenance ( RE-AIM ) model . Data collect fidelity MISSION-Vet IU GTO group . Data also collect subject ' substance use , overall mental health functioning , engagement substance abuse treatment service , length time house , community participation . The investigator collect data individual baseline three time point one year . The investigator ' data analysis strategy use repeated-measures model test significance treatment-by-time interaction accounting cluster design case manager within site . This study intend serve dual function compare implementation MISSION-Vet currently plan VA Office Patient Care Services enhance implementation approach use GTO model . The propose research help guide policy practice action implement MISSION-Vet fidelity effectiveness achieve maximum outcome among homeless Veterans .
